headline: CoreSite Achieves Key Construction Milestone for New DE3 Data Center in Denver
summary: DENVER, October 06, 2025--CoreSite, an American Tower company (NYSE: AMT) empowering critical business and AI workloads that impact everyday life through interconnected data center solutions, recently celebrated a major construction milestone for its new DE3 data center at 4900 Race Street in Denver. CoreSite’s leadership team, state and city leaders, customers, community partners and vendors gathered to commemorate the topping off of CoreSite’s newest development project.

content.title: CoreSite Achieves Key Construction Milestone for New DE3 Data Center in Denver
content.summary: DENVER, October 06, 2025--CoreSite, an American Tower company (NYSE: AMT) empowering critical business and AI workloads that impact everyday life through interconnected data center solutions, recently celebrated a major construction milestone for its new DE3 data center at 4900 Race Street in Denver. CoreSite’s leadership team, state and city leaders, customers, community partners and vendors gathered to commemorate the topping off of CoreSite’s newest development project.

thumbnail.caption: CoreSite's new DE3 data center, located at 4900 Race Street in Denver, will be a 180,000-square-foot facility and is targeted for availability in 2026.

headline: Will Verizon Lease Uncertainty and Carrier Shifts Alter American Tower's (AMT) Growth Narrative?
summary: In recent days, RBC Capital downgraded American Tower (NYSE: AMT), citing near-term lease risks from Verizon's high-rent relocation approach ahead of a master lease expiration with the company. While American Tower continues to expand its communications real estate and data center presence, concerns now focus on muted activity from key wireless carriers and shifting industry dynamics. The inclusion of American Tower among top REIT dividend stocks highlights its consistent dividend record,...
